name: A Handful of Keflings
description: The Keflings need your help! Visit a magical realm and lend the tiny Keflings a hand. Start by building a single home and work towards creating a thriving bastion of culture sure to be the envy of cultural bastions everywhere!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer. Processor: Intel i5-4590 processor equivalent or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater. Storage: 1 GB available space
